attributes.name: Attempt to Deactivate MFA for an Okta User Account v102.0.2
attributes.description: Detects attempts to deactivate multi-factor authentication (MFA) for an Okta user. An adversary may deactivate MFA for an Okta user account in order to weaken the authentication requirements for the account.
author: Elastic
false_positives: If the behavior of deactivating MFA for Okta user accounts is expected, consider adding exceptions to this rule to filter false positives.
attributes.setup: The Okta Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
